title: SCP-173, but every sentence is a crosslink
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div style="text-align: right; margin-right: 2em; margin-top: -20px;"]]

by [[[Ethagon's Author Page| Ethagon]]]

[[/div]]


**[[[scp-3612 |Item #]]]:** [[[SCP-173]]]

**[[[scp-0110-j |Object Class]]]:** [[[containment-psychiatry-orientation |Euclid]]]

**[[[scp-5101 | Special Containment Procedures]]]:** [[[scp-in-a-box-j |Item SCP-173 is to be kept in a locked container at all times]]]**.** [[[d-class-contest |When personnel must enter SCP-173's container]]]**,** [[[lockdown-procedures |no fewer than 3 may enter at any time and the door is to be relocked behind them]]]**.** [[[scp-6711 |At all times]]]**,** [[[scp-3220 |two persons must maintain direct eye contact with SCP-173 until all personnel have vacated and relocked the container]]]**.**

**[[[tuftos-proposal |Description]]]:**  [[[the-siege-of-site-19 |Moved to Site-19 1993]]]**.** [[[how-173-got-to-site-19 |Origin is as of yet unknown]]]**.** [[[scp-2015 |It is constructed from concrete and rebar with traces of Krylon brand spray paint]]]**.** [[[scp-1507 |SCP-173 is animate and extremely hostile]]]**.** [[[goc-supplemental-thaumatology |The object cannot move while within a direct line of sight]]]**.** [[[scp-571 |Line of sight must not be broken at any time with SCP-173]]]**.** [[[alert-lockdown-initiated |Personnel assigned to enter container are instructed to alert one another before blinking]]]**.** [[[conclusions-red-173-2263-incident | Object is reported to attack by snapping the neck at the base of the skull]]]**,** [[[scp-2486 |or by strangulation]]]**.** [[[false-confidence |In the event of an attack]]]**,** [[[containment-hazard-control |personnel are to observe Class 4 hazardous object containment procedures]]]**.**

[[[scp-4691 | Personnel report sounds of scraping stone originating from within the container when no one is present inside]]]**.** [[[wjs-proposal |This is considered normal]]]**,** [[[scp-3362 | and any change in this behaviour should be reported to the acting HMCL supervisor on duty]]]**.**

[[[re-the-statue | The reddish brown substance on the floor is a combination of feces and blood]]]**.** [[[multi-u-101 | Origin of these materials is unknown]]]**.** [[[site-30-s-janitor |The enclosure must be cleaned on a bi-weekly basis]]]**.**
